title: Ashlu Mini Mine
whats_it_like: A short intro to Ashlu paddling, bedrock rapids, boulder gardens and optional waterfall.
scouting_portaging: Mostly only boat-scouting required with a few places you can take a look before if you so wish. Everything is scoutable even at higher flows but portaging some rapids would take a great deal of effort. The final waterfall can be scouted from the takeout bridge, or optionally not run.
